laboratory_examinations.findings: Thyroglobulin concentration of 3750 ng/mL, should be undetectable after thyroidectomy.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Thyroglobulin concentration decreased considerably to 17 ng/mL at last follow-up.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Raised TSH concentration (>80 mU/L) during the fifth course of RIT.
Low serum calcium concentrations leading to treatment for postoperative hypoparathyroidism.
Low parathormone concentrations leading to treatment for postoperative hypoparathyroidism.
